name: todo-monorepo
description: Monorepo para aplicação Todo com arquitetura hexagonal

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix front-end" "npm run dev --prefix back-end"
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix front-end && npm install --prefix back-end
scripts.install:fast: yarn install && yarn install --cwd front-end && yarn install --cwd back-end
